CustomField.description: (Optional) Provides specific backend configuration settings (as JSON data) for the linked 'Action Implementation Logic', tailored for this specific agent's use of the action. The structure must match the 'Binding Config Schema' defined on the selected Action Definition, if one exists.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (Optional) JSON configuration data passed to the backend logic (Apex/Flow) of the linked Action Definition, providing settings specific to how this agent uses the action. This allows customizing a reusable action for a particular agent. The structure MUST match the 'Binding Config Schema' defined on the linked Action Definition (if one is defined there). Leave blank if no agent-specific backend configuration is needed.
CustomField.label: Action Implementation Config (JSON)
